attributes.action: Ban the proposal of Drag Queens visiting Nursery schools to teach gender issues
attributes.additional_details: This is worrying as many child psychologists are concerned that children will be sexualised at such a young age and will become confused about their own sexual identity. Children, especially this young, are extremely impressionable and must not be sexualised in any way regardless of sexual orientation. Children must remain children and this is unacceptable.
attributes.background:
The DQST (Drag Queen Story Time) is pushing to visit nursery schools to teach children as young as 2 years old about gender and alternative lifestyles.
It is being organised across 7 nurseries in London and if successful to another 37 nurseries.

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual childcare and education providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
